name: Emi Labs
headline: Helping great teams hire better frontline workers, faster.
description:
At Emi Labs (YC '19) we are on a mission to increase frontline workers' access to
professional opportunities by building the infrastructure for Frontline Workers (check our
manifesto here: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/our-manifesto-building-infrastructure-frontline-workers-emi-labs/). As our first step, we are transforming the high-volume recruiting
process of Frontline Workers to make it as simple, human, and fair as possible for both
Candidates and Recruiters. Our product is a SaaS recruitment platform powered by AI
that helps companies engage with candidates via text to drive faster and more efficient
hiring processes. We are growing fast, well funded, and obsessed with making our mission
a reality.

Some of their customers include Walmart, Burger King, Starbucks, 7-Eleven, Danone, Imperfect Foods, and Heineken.

# Remove the friction from frontline hiring
Emi is the **frontline recruiting automation platform** that helps recruiters and hiring managers fill high-volume roles fast and delivers a responsive candidate experience.
[Schedule a demo](https://www.emilabs.ai/</request-demo>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac8530fc54bc5ef_Polygon%201.svg)Overview](https://www.emilabs.ai/<#>)
## Trusted by leading global enterprises to hire top talent
![Walmart logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac8531b244bc5e2_walmartlogo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/67771c77a25534cbd5e9890d_ML-izq.png)![Burger King logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac85341224bc5e5_bklogo.svg)![Danone logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853f5d64bc5e4_danonelogo.svg)![Heineken logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/645abd8c2bb22ba81fe355f7_Heineken_Logo%20\(1\).svg)![KFC logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/641cc55ffad2b36dc4fbc9d7_KFC_PrimaryBrandLogo_RGB_BlackEdge-removebg-preview.webp)
## Reimagining frontline recruitment
Most recruiting tools can’t keep up with the demands of high-volume hiring. Emi’s flexible solutions were built to address the real challenges facing frontline recruiting teams.
[Why Emi ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac85343314bc61d_Vector.svg)](https://www.emilabs.ai/</why-emi>)
![Frontline worker in a coffee shop](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac8531f994bc5e8_Group%2048095951.webp)
## Brands that partner with Emi have experienced
# 50%
Reduction in time-to-hire
# 2.3x
Increased productivity of HR team
# 88%
Candidate satisfaction score
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac85397434bc5f0_Group%2048095954.svg)
## Optimize and simplify the entire hiring process
###  **ATTRACTION**
### **Reach candidates wherever they are**
Make it simple to source candidates and eliminate time-wasting, manual outreach.
[Learn more about integrations![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853e7084bc61e_Vector%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.emilabs.ai/</attract>)
![Emi makes it easy for candidates to apply via WhatsApp, SMS, and Facebook Messenger](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac8530d494bc60d_Attarct.webp)
![Emi’s AI provides recruiting teams automated profile screening and scoring for each candidate.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853774f4bc611_Screen.webp)
### **SCREENING**
### **Identify top talent with intelligent screening rules**
Reduce the time to interview and improve candidate quality with customized profile screening and scoring.
[Learn more about screen![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853e7084bc61e_Vector%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.emilabs.ai/</screen>)
### **SCHEDULING**
### **Eliminate the back and forth of interview coordination**
Empower candidates and hiring managers to schedule interviews at their convenience using their preferred communication channels.
[Learn more about schedule![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853e7084bc61e_Vector%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.emilabs.ai/</schedule>)
![With Emi’s automated interview scheduling, candidates and recruiters can schedule meetings in a simpler and faster way.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac8532de94bc615_Schedule.webp)
![Emi provides candidates with digital onboarding and assistance through an active chat.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853941c4bc619_Onboard.webp)
### **ONBOARD**
### **Set new hires up for long-term success**
Digitally process paperwork, train employees, and improve team satisfaction.
[Learn more about onboard![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853e7084bc61e_Vector%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.emilabs.ai/</onboard>)
## Analyze
## Measure and optimize each stage of your hiring process on one platform.
[Learn more about analyze](https://www.emilabs.ai/</analyze>)
![analyze](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/63471b5e19324959e7bc3398_Analyze-Mobile.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac85301944bc5fd_Ellipse%201722.svg)
Track the performance of every posting in real-time
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853edaa4bc5fc_Vector%20198.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac85301944bc5fd_Ellipse%201722.svg)
Identify your most effective sources
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853edaa4bc5fc_Vector%20198.svg)
![Emi provides high-volume analytics dashboards to help hiring teams optimize hiring tasks in real-time.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853d41d4bc5f7_Group%2048095956.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac85301944bc5fd_Ellipse%201722.svg)
Measure candidate satisfaction
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853edaa4bc5fc_Vector%20198.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac85301944bc5fd_Ellipse%201722.svg)
Evaluate the effectiveness of your team
## Integrations
## Emi connects with yourexisting recruiting tech
Integrates Emi seamlessly with your preferred tools and current HR tech stack–from multiple job boards to your ATS (and everything in between).
[Learn more about integrations![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853e7084bc61e_Vector%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.emilabs.ai/</integrations>)
![Emi works with integrated platforms, such as Workday, Indeed, Checkr, ZipRecruiter, Facebook Messenger and SMS.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/661993c2ee1f7b54e2ae0f4f_Integrations_Section.webp)![Integrations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/661993e1e283181a1c9402b8_Integrations_Section_Mobile.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac8530b7a4bc609_%E2%80%9C.svg)
We needed a solution to help simplify our process of recruiting for so many roles across different locations with a small team. Our recruiters can't be everywhere all the time, which is why we needed Emi."
![Image of Jorge Dávila Martinez](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/64cc27686b0486595a263e3f_jorge%20-%20heineken.webp)
Jorge Dávila MartinezTalent & Culture Lead at Heineken
# 33%
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853b5b54bc60c_Vector%20208.svg)
reduction in time-to-fill
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac8530b7a4bc609_%E2%80%9C.svg)
Emi is a flexible and intuitive platform that helped us completely transform our hiring process for frontline workers."
![Image of Carla R.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/634048c5fb7b98ae7567a74f_Pexels%20Photo%20by%20mentatdgt.webp)
Carla R.‍Manager of Technology and Efficiency of Danone
# 80%
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac853b5b54bc60c_Vector%20208.svg)
Reduction in time to first interview
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/6318fb57bac8530b7a4bc609_%E2%80%9C.svg)
Emi helped us shorten our recruitment process, decrease premature turnover, and increase our number of applicants, while providing a better experience for candidates all along the process.”
![Image of Sabrina M.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6083e31b0819810978c546d5/634049ffb2c39e121bf1e916_Pexels%20Photo%20by%20mentatdgt%20\(1\).webp)
Sabrina M.‍HR Manager of Burger King

generated_description:
Emi Labs is a recruitment technology company founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator's W19 batch. Located in Buenos Aires, Argentina, it focuses on transforming the hiring process for frontline workers—those employees who are often the backbone of industries like retail and hospitality.

### Mission
The core mission of Emi Labs is simple yet powerful: help outstanding teams hire better frontline workers, faster. This is not just about streamlining the process; it’s about creating more equitable access to job opportunities for frontline workers. 

### Product Offering
Emi Labs offers a SaaS recruitment platform powered by AI that revolutionizes high-volume hiring. Their innovative solution engages candidates through text messaging—making the whole process more human, efficient, and fair. Features of the platform include:

- **Attraction**: Simplifies candidate sourcing across various channels like WhatsApp and SMS.
- **Screening**: Employs intelligent screening rules to identify top talent quickly.
- **Scheduling**: Streamlines interview coordination, making it easier for candidates and recruiters to connect.
- **Onboarding**: Enhances the experience for new hires through digitized processes and support.
- **Analytics**: Provides real-time measurement of every stage in the hiring pipeline.

### Clients and Impact
Emi Labs boasts an impressive clientele that includes major brands like Walmart, Burger King, Starbucks, and Heineken. Their approach has yielded remarkable results for these companies, such as:

- 50% reduction in time-to-hire.
- 2.3x increase in HR productivity.
- 88% candidate satisfaction score.

### Growth and Structure
With a team of about 50 employees, Emi Labs is growing quickly and is well-funded, underscoring the industry's demand for effective recruitment solutions. They are tagged as a leader in the recruiting technology space and continue evolving to meet the specific needs of frontline recruitment.

### Conclusion
In a world where frontline workers are often overlooked, Emi Labs is working hard to change that narrative. By leveraging AI and thoughtful design, they're not just after speed; they aim for fairness and accessibility in hiring. If you're curious to see their platform in action, you can visit their website at [Emi Labs](https://www.emilabs.ai).
